commandDescription: Notify Salesforce Deployment to Microsoft Teams
urlFlagDescription: target URL (for Microsoft Teams: Webhook URL)
envFlagDescription: Name of the target environment ("current environment" by default)
fromFlagDescription: From tag, to generate the list of commit
toFlagDescription: To tag, to generate the list of commit ("HEAD" by default)
branchFlagDescription: Current Branch name (can use environment variable name, "Current branch" by default)
